body.p: The acquirer shall recognise right-of-use assets and lease liabilities for leases identified in accordance with IFRS 16 in which the acquiree is the lessee. The acquirer is not required to recognise right-of-use assets and lease liabilities for:

li.p: leases for which the lease term (as defined in IFRS 16 ) ends within 12 months of the acquisition date; or
leases for which the underlying asset is of low value (as described in paragraphs B3–B8 of IFRS 16).
